CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​IDObjects.​Base
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CommentTypes.​CommentType
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CommentTypes.​Tag
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​File
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Languages.​CommentFinder

The base class for all objects to be managed with IDObjects.Manager.

Information
Usage

  • The deriving class needs to define Name to give each object a unique textual name.  Name must never change.

Functions
Base
public Base ()
Properties
Name
abstract public string Name { get }

The textual name of the object.

ID
public int ID { get; set }

The numeric ID of the object.  This cannot be changed once it is set the first time.  It will be zero if it's read before that happens.

Variables
id
protected int id

The numberic ID of the object.
